Smart Wallet: A smart wallet that tracks your expenses, saves your receipts, and categorizes your spending. It can also be integrated with your bank account to keep youed on your account balance and transactions.

Wallet with Built-in Charging Port: A wallet that has a built-in charging port for your phone or other electronic devices. This way, you can charge your phone on the go without having to carry a separate charger.
Wallet with Multiple Currency Conversion: A wallet that can convert between multiple currencies. This would be especially useful for travelers who need to exchange money frequently.
Wallet with RFID Blocking: A wallet that blocks RFID signals, which can help prevent identity theft and protect your personal information.
Wallet with GPS Tracking: A wallet that has GPS tracking capabilities, so you can easily locate it if it gets lost or stolen.
